== Rotary encoder ==
|| *Encoder*    || *Function*     ||

== IR remote control (RC5) ==
|| *Button*     || *Function*     ||
|| 2x Power     || Standby on/off ||

|| Up/down      || Scroll up/down ||
|| OK           || Select/Enter   ||
